description:
Karino brings Kotarou and all his friends to the movies. Kotarou wants to see the new Tonosaman film, but the other kids want to watch something else.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Insotsu / Raihousha / Newcomer / Giwaku no Kyuushoku / Collection / Soccer Hiyori
インソツ / 来訪者 / ニューカマー / 疑惑の給食 / コレクション / サッカー日和
